definition: the spread or transmission of something (as news or money) to a wider group or area
details:
noun
- the spread or transmission of something (as news or money) to a wider group or area
- the dissemination of copies of periodicals (as newspapers or magazines)
- free movement or passage (as of cytoplasm within a cell or sap through a plant)
= example: free movement or passage (as of cytoplasm within a cell or sap through a plant)
- movement through a circuit
- number of copies of a newspaper or magazine that are sold
= example: number of copies of a newspaper or magazine that are sold
- (library science) the count of books that are loaned by a library over a specified period
